summary: A youth who finds a dinosaur egg accidentally breaks it. Soon after, she begins to have surreal visions of dinosaurs, including the Tyrannosaurus Rex.
cast: Peter Horton|Liz Stauber|Kari Coleman|Charlene Sashuk|Daniel Libman|Tuck Milligan|Laurie Murdoch|Joshua Silberg|Alex Hudson|Chris Enright|Neil Fifer
